actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to enable farmers and ranchers to obtain farm ownership loans for the purpose of refinancing loans.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit the use of farm ownership loans to refinance loans.

titles.title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to enable farmers and ranchers to obtain farm ownership loans for the purpose of refinancing loans.
